Tranty : Im sorry u have that kind of problem.. u really shouldn't have.. first u have too keep mds file mounted, and close daemon, but let emulation stay( they should aske and you press yes).. if that dont work, right click shortcut and choose properties i think( my stands on norwegian) then press compadibility.. If combadibilitymodus says windows 95 try to change to windows NT, many have made that work..  probably its only a minor thing that ruines ur playing... but its annoying either way..  have u tried "sdhide4"???
only safedisk shall be hooked on in emulation(daemon)....  Sdhide4 u kan find at gamecopyworld.com  just bother to look a bit... thanks guys...
